text: Čermáňsky FK Nitra is a Slovak football team, based in the town of Nitra. The club was founded in 1945. == Events timeline == * 1945 – Founded as Dynamo Čermáň * 1970 – Renamed Strojár Nitra * 2003 – Renamed ČFK Nitra ==References== == External links == *Official website Category:Football clubs in Slovakia CFK Category:Association football clubs established in 1945 Category:1945 establishments in Slovakia
title: ČFK Nitra
